title: Symbolism in the Church Fathers - Jonathan Hill from the Ground
description:
Jonathan Hill has a blog called Orthodox Theology of the Beautiful and is starting a new podcast,  The Ground,  which looks at the world through the lens of Symbolism, especially as described by St-Nicolai Velimirovich.


The Ground podcast
https://thegroundpodcast.transistor.fm/

The Orthodox Theology of the Beautiful
https://orthodoxtheologyofthebeautiful.wordpress.com/

The Universe as Symbols and Signs by St-Nicolai
https://www.stspress.com/shop/books/orthodox-spiritual-life/the-universe-as-symbols-and-signs-an-essay-on-mysticism-in-the-eastern-church/

St-Dyonisius monastery
https://saintdionysiosmonastery.org/


My links: 
Support this channel: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
subscribestar: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonathan-pageau
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld
twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan
Bitchute:  https://www.bitchute.com/channel/pageaujonathan/
Dtube: https://steemit.com/@symbolism

The unofficial facebook discussion group: 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1989208418065298/
